service_request_text: Replace the limit switch on XV-18224
failure_description: The rotating rake in the product cooler that is meant to distribute the product evenly across the louvers often gets the distribution rakes moved out of position due to excessive levels in the cooler and higher than desirable moisture in the cooler. This also wears other mechanical components prematurely as well.

service_request_text: Vibration System Ethernet Connection and AI wiring
failure_description: The fan wheel gets product build up on it over time causing it to run un-balanced. This eventually causes the pillow block bearings housings to start wearing between the cap and the outerrace of the bearing leading to pre-mature bearing failures.

service_request_text: P-1837 Dryer A Hydro Heater Pump Seal Leak

service_request_text: Tail bearings noisy and loose
failure_description: The conveyor has experienced premature bearing failures that has caused excessive down time to the dryer equipment. This is an inlcine auger that takes alot of thrust load, the original spherical roller bearing that was specced out on the conveyor does not take thrust load very well. We have since changed to taper roller style bearing better suited for thrust loads but we have not had enough run time on them to know if this is going to fix the issue.

This also wears other mechanical components prematurely as well.

service_request_text: Viraj - TP14 to be chnaged to -4.25
failure_description: The dust collector has alot of moist air that goes through it causing the filter bags to clog off prematurely. This causes poor dust collection and also results in reduced air flow through the dryer system resulting in reduced dyer effeciency, and eventually down time if new filter bags are required to obtain proper air flow.

We have since changed to taper roller style bearing better suited for thrust loads but we have not had enough run time on them to know if this is going to fix the issue.

service_request_text: DRO - Small hole in DC1834 hopper
failure_description: The dust collector has alot of moist air that goes through it causing the filter bags to clog off prematurely. This causes poor dust collection and also results in reduced air flow through the dryer system resulting in reduced dyer effeciency, and eventually down time if new filter bags are required to obtain proper air flow.
